subject: Re: [junit] Can any friend tell me about how to simulate HttpServletRequest & HttpServeltResponse & HttpSenssion.
msgSnippet: Since HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse are both interface, I would personally strongly suggest the EasyMock, whcih can be found at the following
messageBody:
Since HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse are both interface, I
would personally strongly suggest the EasyMock, whcih can be found at
the following link:

http://tammofreese.de/easymock/index.html


--
